javaly.core

Class Test

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaly.core.Test

  • public final class Test
extends java.lang.Object
    Test is an adapter that wraps JUnit and provides a familiar interface for instructors who have previously used JUnit before.

    It stores all test results for each execution of assertion statements so that it may be retrieved by our own engine later.

    However, a key distinction is the fact that assertion failures and other exceptions do not float to the client. Hence, we have provided a printResults() method to check for any errors before submission to Javaly.

    All Test classes for Javaly that you write must import static all methods from this class.

    Usage is as below:

    Let's say your question expects a student to define the following function

    public static int add(int a, int b){return a + b;}

    You would have the following Test class: 

     
 import static javaly.core.Test.*;
 public class AddTest{
  public static void main(String[] args){
    assertEquals(5, [nameOfClass].add(2, 3));
    assertEquals(0, [nameOfClass].add(0, 0));
    assertEquals(-1, [nameOfClass].add(-1, 0));
    finish();
    printResults(); //check whether the test cases are correct before submission to javaly
  }
 }

    Or more generally: 

     
 import static javaly.core.Test.*;
 //other import statements
 ...

 public class GenericTest{
  public static void main(String[] args){
  //preparation code
   ...
  //test code
  assertEquals([description,] expectedObject, outputObject);
  ...
  //print results for checking
  printResults();
  }
 }

    If you need to check results from stdout, see SysOutInvoker.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void assertEquals(java.lang.Object o1, java.lang.Object o2)
      Compares two objects and saves the result to the results storage.
      static void assertEquals(java.lang.String description, java.lang.Object o1, java.lang.Object o2)
      Compares two objects and saves the result together with the description to the results storage.
      static javaly.model.Results getResults()
      Retrieves the results assert statements.
      static void printResults()
      Prints the results of the assert statements to the standard output.
      static void setServerVersion(boolean isServer)
      Sets whether the Test is running on a server.

    • Method Detail

      • assertEquals

        public static void assertEquals(java.lang.Object o1,
                                java.lang.Object o2)
        Compares two objects and saves the result to the results storage.

        The objects to be compared must already have the equals() method defined.

        Parameters:
        o1 - Expected object to be created
        o2 - Actual object created

      • assertEquals

        public static void assertEquals(java.lang.String description,
                                java.lang.Object o1,
                                java.lang.Object o2)
        Compares two objects and saves the result together with the description to the results storage.

        The objects to be compared must already have the equals() method defined.

        Parameters:
        description - Description of the test case
        o1 - Expected object to be created
        o2 - Actual object created

      • printResults

        public static void printResults()
        Prints the results of the assert statements to the standard output. This is to allow inspection to ensure the Test class works.

        The objects to be printed must already have the toString() method defined.

      • getResults

        public static javaly.model.Results getResults()
        Retrieves the results assert statements.

        For internal use only.

        Returns:
        A Results object containing the results of the assert statements

      • setServerVersion

        public static void setServerVersion(boolean isServer)
        Sets whether the Test is running on a server.

        For internal use only.

        Parameters:
        isServer - A boolean flag to be set.
